TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventDescriptorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是唯讀的。它不會實作加入或移除事件的方法。 is read-only; it does not implement methods that add or remove events. 您必須繼承自這個類別來實作這些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用中可用的屬性類別，您可以查詢有關集合的內容。Using the properties available in the class, you can query the collection about its contents. 使用 屬性，判斷集合中的項目數目。Use the property to determine the number of elements in the collection. 使用屬性，即可依索引編號或名稱取得特定的屬性。Use the property to get a specific property by index number or by name. 您也可以使用方法從集合取得具有指定名稱的事件的描述。You can also use the method to get a description of the event with the specified name from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印在文字方塊中的按鈕上的所有事件。The following code example prints all the events on a button in a text box. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`具現化表單上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`events`參數是空的這個建構函式會建立空類別。If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty class. 套用至這個成員的屬性具有下列屬性值： 。The attribute applied to this member has the following property value: . 不會影響桌面應用程式 (這些應用程式的啟動方式一般都是按兩下圖示、輸入命令或在瀏覽器輸入 URL)。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新類別上使用事件`button1`。The following code example creates a new class using the events on `button1`. 它要求`button1`已經產生的表單上。It requires that `button1` has been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.EventDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來設定限制的迴圈，逐一查看集合的物件。The property can be used to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 如果集合是以零為起始，務必使用`Count - 1`做為迴圈的上限。If the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. > [!NOTE] > 屬性套用至這個類別具有下列屬性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不會影響桌面應用程式 (這些應用程式的啟動方式一般都是按兩下圖示、輸入命令或在瀏覽器輸入 URL)。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用列印的事件數目的屬性附加至`button1`。The following code example uses the property to print the number of events attached to `button1`. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`具現化表單上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以零為起始的索引編號。The index number is zero-based. 因此，必須減 1 的特定數值位置存取， 。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如，若要取得第三個，您必須指定`myColl[2]`。For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用要列印的名稱屬性索引編號，在文字方塊中所指定。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 以零為起始的索引編號，因為此範例會列印第二個名稱。Because the index number is zero-based, this example prints the name of the second . 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`具現化表單上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form.
